title: Add 5 new Colt-themed game spinoffs to the Games tab

requirements.text: Add 5 new playable browser games to the Games tab, each built on a canvas with the existing neon/cyberpunk aesthetic and matching the GlassCard grid layout in GamesTab.tsx. The games must be: (1) Colt Pong — a Pong variant where the player controls a paddle against a CPU opponent; (2) Colt Tetris — a Tetris variant with falling neon-colored tetrominoes; (3) Colt Breakout — a Breakout/Arkanoid variant with a paddle, ball, and destructible neon blocks; (4) Colt Asteroids — a top-down shooter where the player shoots neon asteroids; (5) Colt Racer — a top-down endless lane-dodging racer. Each game must have a score counter and a restart mechanic. All five games must be selectable from the existing GamesTab game grid and open in the full-screen game view with a back button, consistent with how Flappy Colt and Neon Snake are currently displayed.

quotes: could you add more games like 5 of spinoffs of other games but make sure it has the word colt in it

acceptanceCriteria: GamesTab displays a card for each of the 5 new games: Colt Pong, Colt Tetris, Colt Breakout, Colt Asteroids, and Colt Racer.
Each game card is a GlassCard with the game name and a brief description, consistent with the existing Flappy Colt and Neon Snake cards.
Clicking a game card opens the game in the full-screen game view inside GamesTab with a visible back button.
All 5 games are fully playable with keyboard or mouse/click controls.
Every game has a live score counter visible during gameplay.
Every game has a restart mechanic (button or key press) that resets the game state.
All games use the existing neon/cyberpunk canvas aesthetic (dark background, glowing neon colors, matching the existing game style).
The word 'Colt' appears in the name of every new game.
No regressions to Flappy Colt or Neon Snake gameplay or navigation.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
New game components must follow the same canvas-based pattern used in FlappyColt.tsx and SnakeGame.tsx.
All new games must be wired into GamesTab.tsx without altering the existing tab navigation or header.
nonGoals: No backend changes required for this feature.
No multiplayer or networked game features.
No changes to the Proxy, Music, or More tabs.
No new tabs or navigation items.
